smartappliances.name: Smart Thermostat
smartappliances.description: Google Nest Thermostat 3rd Generation is a programmable smart thermostat that learns your schedule and the temperatures you like and programs itself to help you save energy and stay comfortable.

smartappliances.name: Smart Shades
smartappliances.description: MySmartRollerShades are the smartest, Bluetooth-enabled roller shades for interior windows. include a solar charging panel so you never have to plug them in.

smartappliances.name: Smart Lighting
smartappliances.description: Each kit contains 4 Philips Hue White A19 60W Energy Star Certified LED Smart bulbs. Bulbs can be controlled remotely with the Philips Hue App or voice activated with Alexa.
